column1: NETMESSAGE:Well, I didn't expect a small mercenary team to kill so many of my men... I guess you also got the scientist I was waiting for.
column2: 好吧，我没想到区区一支雇佣兵小队竟能杀了我这么多的人...我猜你也找到我在等的那个科学家了

column1: NETMESSAGE:I'm very impressed, but you know too much, I can't let you get out of here alive...
column2: 虽然你的表现令我刮目相看，但是你知道的太多了，我不能让你活着走出这里...

column1: NETMESSAGE:We have here all the proofs we need, we should get out of here before it gets worse !
column2: 我们拿到了我们需要的一切证据，现在得赶紧想办法逃出去！

column1: NETMESSAGE:So this officer was behind all this. He paid the scientist to steal the NP Society's researches...
column2: 这个军官是背后主使，他花钱雇科学家偷走了NP协会的研究资料...
但是，他的目的又是什么呢？
